search_input:
Aristocrats would use its exuberance in design to flex

*its refined sensibilities, as seen in the intricate carvings on the palace walls. The excess of its lavish furnishings, adorned with precious gems and metals, was a testament to its grandeur. In the evenings, the soft glow of candles and lanterns would dance across the polished marble floors, casting a warm, inviting ambiance.*
suggested_query: its refined sensibilities, as seen in the intricate carvings on the palace walls. The excess of its lavish furnishings, adorned with precious gems and metals, was a testament to its grandeur. In the evenings, the soft glow of candles and lanterns would dance across the polished marble floors, casting a warm, inviting ambiance.
suggest_context: Aristocrats would use its exuberance in design to flex
